i’m not aware tbh to your Q. i was hoping the L2beat gov forum could eventually become such a venue but im not sure it’s really used at the moment? (re @eliastzr: Is there a chat for rollup core devs to talk about their common hardships?

Example: integrating https://github.com/paradigmxyz/flood into a rollup’s integration test suite and running into issues such as mentioned in https://github.com/paradigmxyz/flood/issues/57 (running flood on non-L1 envs)

I think it could be really nice I don’t know if it exists yet.

Other examples where it can be super useful:
- challenges on some edge cases on L1 data formats (fee market & base fee, block hash computation choices, etc.)
- ethereum foundation tests choices and tradeoffs)
